overview: A couple's relationship is falling apart after the death of their young son. The couple is living in a cabin in a beach town to try and mend things before they head off to Mexico for Carlos' religious work. Romina, who is battling depression, seeks out a mysterious man. In what Carlos and Romina thought would be a trip to bring them closer together only makes them realize the trip served to further the divide.
title: Buena Fe
